channel.title: Verinia II; where perfection isn't a choice, but the standard
channel.description:
[CENTER] [FONT=Arial Narrow]URLs: [URL=http://"http://verinia.com"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://verinia.com/VeriniaGameClient.jar"]Download[/URL] [URL=http://"http://verinia.com/community/"]Forum[/URL] [URL=http://"http://verinia.com/highscores/"]Highscores[/URL][/FONT]
[FONT=Arial Narrow]Developers: Vip3r Torv[/FONT]
[FONT=Arial Narrow]Welcome to Verinia (II), we are a RuneScape Private Server (build 498) which launched at January 09, 2015. With the aim to recreate RuneScape as it was back in 2008. We have already finished all skills 100%, we are constantly bringing more content for our community to enjoy. If you have any queries or suggestions please let us know on the forums.[/FONT]
[spoiler="World 1"][IMG]http://verinia.com/verinia.jpg[/img][/spoiler] [spoiler="World 2"]Please note, we are not the same as the other Verinia server, yes this is just another world but its another game altogether. Its more appropriate for players who are just looking to get on and have some fun and not grind at experience.
[SIZE=5]PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU SELECT WORLD 2!
[IMG]http://verinia.com/bloodshed.jpg[/img]
[/SIZE] [/spoiler]
[FONT=Arial Narrow]Credits: Stade(For GFX) Emperor & Vexia[/FONT] [/CENTER]

item.title: Verinia II; where perfection isn't a choice, but the standard
item.dc:creator: @pumpklins pumpklins
item.description:
@pumpklins wrote:

[CENTER]
[FONT=Arial Narrow]URLs:
[URL=http://“http://verinia.com”]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://verinia.com/VeriniaGameClient.jar”]Download[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://verinia.com/community/”]Forum[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://verinia.com/highscores/”]Highscores[/URL][/FONT]

[FONT=Arial Narrow]Developers:
Vip3r
Torv[/FONT]

[FONT=Arial Narrow]Welcome to Verinia (II), we are a RuneScape Private Server (build 498) which launched at January 09, 2015. With the aim to recreate RuneScape as it was back in 2008.
We have already finished all skills 100%, we are constantly bringing more content for our community to enjoy. If you have any queries or suggestions please let us know on the forums.[/FONT]

[spoiler=“World 1”][/spoiler]
[spoiler=“World 2”]Please note, we are not the same as the other Verinia server, yes this is just another world but its another game altogether. Its more appropriate for players who are just looking to get on and have some fun and not grind at experience.

[SIZE=5]PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU SELECT WORLD 2!

[/SIZE]
[/spoiler]

[FONT=Arial Narrow]Credits:
Stade(For GFX)
Emperor & Vexia[/FONT]
[/CENTER]

Read full topic
item.source: Verinia II; where perfection isn't a choice, but the standard
